kpis.name: Meeting gate readiness
kpis.description: Are next-meeting inputs on track by pre-read deadline?
rules: If no upcoming meeting exists in timeline, report yellow pending schedule instrumentation.

kpis.name: Overdue deliverables
kpis.description: Count and severity of overdue deliverables.
rules: Deliverables past due and not completed are overdue.
Score decays with overdue count and max overdue days.

kpis.name: Blocked-by-dependency rate
kpis.description: Rate of deliverables blocked by unmet dependencies.
rules: If no depends_on fields are present, KPI is yellow (not yet instrumented).

kpis.name: ID integrity
kpis.description: No dangling deliverable references across SoR files.
rules: All referenced deliverable IDs must exist in sor/deliverables.yml.

kpis.name: Ownership completeness
kpis.description: Deliverables and workstreams have explicit, non-placeholder ownership.
rules: Each deliverable needs at least one owner (owners[] or assigned_to).
Each workstream must have a lead (co-lead optional).

kpis.name: Gate mapping completeness
kpis.description: Deliverables map to valid timeline checkpoints.
rules: If checkpoint_id is absent, report yellow as not yet instrumented.

kpis.name: Definition-of-done completeness
rules: If definition_of_done is absent, report yellow as not yet instrumented.

kpis.name: Principle linkage readiness
rules: If principle_refs is absent from schema usage, report yellow not yet instrumented.

kpis.name: Risk register linkage readiness
rules: If risk_refs is absent from schema usage, report yellow not yet instrumented.

kpis.name: Freshness
kpis.description: SoR and public changelog are updated within freshness threshold.
rules: SoR files and changelog should be updated within 7 days.

kpis.name: Public artifact availability
kpis.description: Deliverables should have public_url or be explicitly committee_only.
rules: A deliverable is compliant when public_url exists or committee_only=true.
